description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This is a very simple shoot them up game, based on old school games. Only Black/White/Grey colors are used, exept paper color.  It's contain 20 wave of aliens attacks +6 boss. double triple quad and fast double, boomerang, powerball, stars forever(200 stars),magic balls, mines Sweep + 2x 4x and 5x bonus + Shield .
